metadata.title: CVE-2023-28746 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Information exposure through microarchitectural state after transientexecution from some register files for some Intel(R) Atom(R) Processors mayallow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosurevia local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28746` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20240514.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20240514.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1').
